title: No Fee- Fully Renovated 3B/2B - Doorman/Garage/Gym/Roofdeck & more!
neighborhood: Clinton Hill/Brooklyn Navy Yard(Manhattan direct ferry
posting_body: ['Fully renovated, sprawling 1400sf 3B/2B with fabulous closet space and in-unit laundry.', 'Unit is occupied until 7/31.', 'Available for 8/15 move in.', 'Email volume is extremely heavy – please call between 8am-7pm to reach us quickly.', 'Now open for application!', 'In the building:', '- Newly renovated attended lobby', '- New entry with phone connected intercom system', '- Package room', '- Furnished roof deck with stunning Manhattan view', '- Fitness Center with Peloton', '- Elevators- Indoor garage parking ($275 cars – $300 SUVs)', '- Storage', '- 10,000sf Spa and Wet Lounge', '-Le Petit Monstre French Bakery and Grocery', '- 8000sf Co-Working Space', 'On the block:', '- Brooklyn Roasting Company', '- 121 Fitness', '- Recess Art Gallery', '- Il Porto Wood Oven Pizza and Restaurant', '- Grapeshot Wine Boutique', '- Burger Ur Way', '-Greenway Salads', 'Dozens of other bars, restaurants, coffee, shopping, Wegmans, Building 77 Food Court, Rooftop Reds and more!', 'Need a guarantor?', 'Rhino and The Guarantors accepted.', 'Ideal for commuters, 275 Park Avenue is located by the Manhattan direct NYC Ferry at the Brooklyn Navy Yard which allows a fast 10-minute ride to Wall Street and 12-minute ride to Midtown.', 'There is also a Citi Bike station with 45 docks located right outside as well as easy access to the Clinton/Washington G subway line, York Street F subway line and Jay Street/Metrotech A,C,F and R trains, as well as the B62, B57 and B69 bus lines.']
